20110112010822.000|20110112010823.000|CC1|ADDITIONAL NOTES HAVE BEEN FOUND
20110112010823.000|20110112010826.000|CC1|IN THE HOME OF JARED LOUGHNER.  
20110112010826.000|20110112010827.000|CC1|ONE IN PARTICULAR DEEPLY        
20110112010827.000|20110112010828.000|CC1|TROUBLING AND PERHAPS A         
20110112010828.000|20110112010832.000|CC1|PREMONITION OF WHAT HE DID IN A 
20110112010832.000|20110112010835.000|CC1|NOTE THAT SAYS "DIE BITCH" IN

20110112010836.000|20110112010838.000|CC1|HAVE BEEN WRITTEN THAT HAVE BEEN
20110112010838.000|20110112010839.000|CC1|RELEASED ALREADY.               
20110112010839.000|20110112010842.000|CC1|I PLANNED AHEAD MY ASSASSINATION
20110112010842.000|20110112010844.000|CC1|AND THE NAME GIFFORDS REFERRING 
20110112010844.000|20110112010846.000|CC1|TO THE CONGRESSWOMAN WHO BY ALL

20110112013334.000|20110112013335.000|CC1|ARIZONA HAVE PASSED LAWS THAT

20110112014356.000|20110112014357.000|CC1|        [ Male Announcer ]      
20110112014357.000|20110112014359.000|CC1|   IF YOU HAVE TYPE 2 DIABETES, 
20110112014359.000|20110112014359.000|CC1|YOU STRUGGLE TO CONTROL         
20110112014359.000|20110112014400.000|CC1|YOUR BLOOD SUGAR.               
20110112014400.000|20110112014402.000|CC1|YOU EXERCISE AND EAT RIGHT,     
20110112014402.000|20110112014402.000|CC1|BUT YOUR BLOOD SUGAR            
20110112014402.000|20110112014404.000|CC1|MAY STILL BE HIGH,              
20110112014404.000|20110112014406.000|CC1|AND YOU NEED EXTRA HELP.        
20110112014406.000|20110112014406.000|CC1|  ASK YOUR DOCTOR ABOUT ONGLYZA,
20110112014406.000|20110112014410.000|CC1|      A ONCE DAILY MEDICINE     
20110112014410.000|20110112014410.000|CC1|   USED WITH DIET AND EXERCISE  
20110112014410.000|20110112014413.000|CC1|   TO CONTROL HIGH BLOOD SUGAR  
20110112014413.000|20110112014415.000|CC1|IN ADULTS WITH TYPE 2 DIABETES. 
20110112014415.000|20110112014415.000|CC1|          ADDING ONGLYZA        
20110112014415.000|20110112014417.000|CC1|  TO YOUR CURRENT ORAL MEDICINE 
20110112014417.000|20110112014417.000|CC1|         MAY HELP REDUCE        
20110112014417.000|20110112014420.000|CC1|  AFTER MEAL BLOOD SUGAR SPIKES 
20110112014420.000|20110112014420.000|CC1|       AND MAY HELP REDUCE      
20110112014420.000|20110112014423.000|CC1|    HIGH MORNING BLOOD SUGAR.   
20110112014423.000|20110112014423.000|CC1|[ Male Announcer ]              
20110112014423.000|20110112014425.000|CC1|ONGLYZA SHOULD NOT BE USED      
20110112014425.000|20110112014425.000|CC1|TO TREAT TYPE 1 DIABETES

20110112014431.000|20110112014434.000|CC1|WITH INSULIN.

20110112014434.000|20110112014436.000|CC1|SUCH AS SULFONYLUREAS           
20110112014436.000|20110112014438.000|CC1|MAY CAUSE LOW BLOOD SUGAR.

20110112014438.000|20110112014440.000|CC1|SUGAR ARE SHAKING,              
20110112014440.000|20110112014442.000|CC1|SWEATING AND RAPID HEARTBEAT.   
20110112014442.000|20110112014442.000|CC1|CALL YOUR DOCTOR IF YOU HAVE    
20110112014442.000|20110112014445.000|CC1|AN ALLERGIC REACTION LIKE RASH, 
20110112014445.000|20110112014445.000|CC1|HIVES OR SWELLING OF THE FACE,

20110112015921.000|20110112015923.000|CC1|SHE THOUGHT SHE WAS HOLDING HIM 
20110112015923.000|20110112015925.000|CC1|AND HER LEG STARTED HURTING AND 
20110112015925.000|20110112015926.000|CC1|IT WASN'T UNTIL THEY GOT TO THE 
20110112015926.000|20110112015928.000|CC1|HOSPITAL THAT SHE EVEN REALIZED 
20110112015928.000|20110112015931.000|CC1|SHE HAD BEEN SHOT.              
20110112015931.000|20110112015934.000|CC1|>> LOOKING FOR A POSITIVE FEMALE
20110112015934.000|20110112015936.000|CC1|ROLE MODEL FOR HER FRIEND'S     
20110112015936.000|20110112015937.000|CC1|DAUGHTER.                       
20110112015937.000|20110112015939.000|CC1|SHE TOOK THE BUDDING POLITICIAN 
20110112015939.000|20110112015941.000|CC1|TO CONGRESSMAN GIFFORDS' DEFENSE
20110112015941.000|20110112015942.000|CC1|SATURDAY AND WAS HOLDING THE
